page.title: 10Arts And Crafts In Dent.
page.content: Still in Dentdale, going north towards Sedbergh is Dent Craft Centre where you can also buy homemade refreshments.This shop is owned and run by the Bradleys.In it you can see printing being done on Victorian printing presses, watch a potter at work,see toys and other items being made from old bobbins, printing blocks etc,also watch a knitter design garments and knit them on her machine. To the south of Dentdale is a man who makes harpsicords and other 17th century instruments his name is Dennis Wooley. These are just some of the crafts and arts being done in Dentdale, there is an excellent amateur drama group, and ladies choir, all bursting with talent and the enthusiasm of the local community.
